reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Excellent teacher, explains complex concepts clearly and patiently.

reviews.review: Engaging lectures, but assignments can be quite demanding.

reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Lee is always available for extra help.

reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes moves too quickly through material.

reviews.review: Fantastic lab sessions and very well-organized lectures.

reviews.review: Interesting content, though grading can be somewhat subjective.

reviews.review: Brilliant instructor who makes difficult concepts accessible.

reviews.review: Provides good feedback, but assignment instructions can be vague.

reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Brown is always willing to help.

reviews.review: Stimulating discussions, though the reading load is heavy.

reviews.review: Inspiring lectures and encourages creative thinking.

reviews.review: Very knowledgeable, but lectures can be dry at times.

reviews.review: Challenging material presented in an understandable way.

reviews.review: Fair exams, but could provide more practice problems.
